name: Karousel
body:
### What is it ? It's a lightweight carousel , built using the javascript jQuery library. Karousel was designed to be a dynamic lightweight utility that gives webdesigners a powerful way of enhancing a website's user interface. ### Features ``` * Can slide vertical or horizontal * Supports navigation by button or paging * The point where the carousel starts can be set * Cyclic option can be set * Any number of blocks can be moved at a time . * A interval can be set to slide automatically every given milliseconds * Easy customizable * Supports all current browsers (Firefox, Internet Explorer 6+, Safari, Opera, Chrome). * It has no specific css , so it's all user's decision to make it responsive. * It is very flexible. * Lightweight its only 100 lines of code. minified size is 1,16 kb. ``` ### Need support or custom features? Anything is possible! For a small fee i can help you implement the script in your project. Missing any features? I can build them for you !! Click [here](mailto:kumarappan.ar@gmail.com) for my email. ### Examples Examples have been demonstrated. Click [here](http://kumarappan.co.nf/karousel/) to go to the examples. ### Options Vertical
vertical:true *** Pager
pager:true *** Cyclic
cyclic:true *** Automatic
automate:true
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
